Module contents¶

The CLI (Command Line Interface) for python3-journal.

Some parts are still kind of unstable but it is ready to use. Th CLI is divided into a bunch of modules.

TODO: make the CLI more bullteproof FIXME: The cli is currently spamming archive files if someone uses expand_archive.
